name: github-calendar
description: Embed your GitHub contributions calendar anywhere.

scripts.release: browserify lib/index.js -o dist/github-calendar.min.js -s GitHubCalendar && babel dist/github-calendar.min.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o dist/github-calendar.min.js

author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (http://ionicabizau.net)

content: <!-- Prepare a container for your calendar. -->
<!-- Optionally, include the theme (if you don't want to struggleto write the CSS) -->
<!-- Prepare a container for your calendar. -->
Loading the data just for you.

ul: Big thanks to [**@izuzak**](https://github.com/izuzak) for creating the [urlreq](https://github.com/izuzak/urlreq) project–the default proxy used by this library. :cake:
Part of the CSS code was taken from the GitHub profile page to offer the same experience. :art:

description.p: Everybody loves GitHub and everybody loves stats. So, why not making the GitHub contributions calendar available for being embeded in your web pages? Now [you can](http://ionicabizau.github.io/github-calendar/example). :tada:
